summary: Texas is the second largest state in the United States.
full_text:
Meridian is a city and the county seat of Bosque County in central Texas, United States. The population was 1,493 at the 2010 census.
^ "American FactFinder". United States Census Bureau. Retrieved 2008-01-31. 
^ "US Board on Geographic Names". United States Geological Survey. 2007-10-25. Retrieved 2008-01-31. 
^ "Find a County". National Association of Counties. Retrieved 2011-06-07. 
^ "Profile of General Population and Housing Characteristics: 2010 Demographic Profile Data : Meridian city, Texas". U.S. Census Bureau, American Factfinder. Retrieved October 30, 2012.
title: Meridian, Texas
